Description.Text: This is a unique hotel in the city, well located, well equipped and providing a very special breakfast, not the ordinary continental breakfast but something else worth trying! Highly recommended for demanding guests. The hotel also provides the following items free of charge:breakfast served in room, pillow menu, Wi FI in all areas and rooms, business centre, Internet corner, Ipod dock, CD/DVD player in room, library, safe deposit box, tourist info, MP3 guides (English, French, Italian, Spanish), mobile chargers, baby cot, bathrobes. Also at extra cost: Spa&Wellness centre, bicycles, DVD rental, Minibar, Personal shopper. 02/11MP

This out of the ordinary hotel is found within walking distance to the main centre and shopping areas, right in the centre and the closest to the Convention Palace designed by Santiago Calatrava. Oviedo is a lively and elegant city rich in culture and history due to its large number of monuments, five of them in the Worls' Heritage listing.

Its rooms are all moderly designed and functionally furnished and fitted. Their decoration as the rest of the hotel are of a special style mixing modern and traditional items creating a very singular and smart atmosphere. They all come with full bahroom and equipment. They might vary in size but are most of them medium.

This is a unique building in the surroundings. It is a round shaped covered in dark red colour tower. The lower part of the building is a large window which lets the Sushi&Salad bar show to the exterior. The main entrance leads to the reception on the left and to the library just opposite the main entrance, below the library the Sushi Bar and breakfast area.

The Sushi&Salad Bar is a very trendy place where to taste their specialities. Breakfast included in rtaes can be served in your room with no extra costs. Its a very special breakfast although it is called basic breakfast including pastries, toasts, cereals, home made sponge, yogurt, fresh fruit, fresh orange juice, water and hot drinks. At extra cost you can also enjoy a buffet breakfast or the special M breakfast.
The lobby is quite spacius and is decorated in white colour and nice pieces of furniture creating an stylish and modern look.
